channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem appears to have forgotten video evidence showing how the incident with Sen. Alex Padilla actually went down.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Excitement — and concerns — over OpenAI's Sora 2 and other AI video tools
item.description: Sora 2 and Meta's "Vibes" feature lets users' imagination run wild in creating online video. That could get messy, tech experts say.

item.title: Arrest made in connection with Palisades Fire: Sources
item.description: The fire caused widespread destruction in Los Angeles County and killed a dozen people earlier this year.

item.title: National Guard troops are outside Chicago and could be in Memphis soon in Trump’s latest deployment
item.description: National Guard troops are positioned outside Chicago and they could soon be in Memphis as the Trump administration pushes ahead with an aggressive pol...

item.title: 10/8: CBS Morning News
item.description: Government shutdown extends to second week; Blue Origin launch highlights growing space tourism industry.

item.title: Senate prepares to vote again on Day 8 of government shutdown
item.description: The government shutdown stretched into Day 8 on Wednesday with more Senate votes planned. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Comey pleads not guilty, will look to dismiss case for vindictive prosecution
item.description: Former FBI Director James Comey pleaded not guilty Wednesday to federal charges of lying to Congress.

item.title: WATCH: London police dismantle international phone theft gang
item.description: Police in London have made dozens of arrests linked to a criminal gang who are alleged to have smuggled 40,000 stolen mobile phones from the U.K. to C...

item.title: Century-old grenades found hidden in delivery of onions
item.description: The grenades, dating from 1925, were found in a consignment of onions heading from France to a factory in the northern Dutch province of Zeeland.

item.title: Joan Kennedy, first wife of Sen. Edward Kennedy, has died
item.description: The first wife of the late Sen. Edward Kennedy, Joan Kennedy, died Wednesday at the age of 89
